entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low zero with risk of frost.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then clearing. Snow level 1600 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low zero with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
